content: *lovely crochet blanket with interesting varied squares pattern measures approximately 50 inches 127 cm wide x 56 inches 142 cm long shown in patons decor crochet using size 5 5 mm u s i or 9 hook patons yarns * skill level easy materials patons decor 100 g/3 5 oz main color mc 16434 rich new rose 2 balls contrast a 16522 pale new green 3 balls contrast b 16523 new green 3 balls contrast c 16525 dark new green 3 balls contrast d 16605 burnt orange 4 balls contrast e 01648 rich country pink 6 balls *6 colors 21 balls total* size 5 5 mm u s i or 9 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge block a make 15 large square make 2 for each block a small square 1 make 4 for each block a small square 2 make 4 for each block a block b make 15 blocks/squares are worked in row and rounds join blocks together work 3-round edging to finish assembly diagrams are provided in pdf download september 2008 french version september 2008 couverture au crochet 1 1 http //www patonsyarns com/data/pattern/pdf/patons_decorweb1_cr_blanket fr_ca pdf
